# Prompt Engineering Content Instructions

## Audience
Content about prompt engineering targets:
- Developers using GitHub Copilot
- Teams implementing AI-assisted workflows
- Technical writers optimizing AI content generation

## Practical Focus
- Include real-world examples from this repository
- Show before/after comparisons
- Demonstrate actual prompt files in `.github/prompts/`
- Link to working examples in `.copilot/context/examples/`

## Tool Coverage
When discussing tools, specify:
- **<mark>VS Code** features and availability
- **<mark>Visual Studio** features and version requirements
- Differences between IDEs
- GitHub Copilot CLI capabilities

## Best Practices
- Reference official GitHub Copilot documentation
- Cite version-specific features accurately
- Include YAML frontmatter examples
- Show complete prompt file structures
- Explain metadata usage and benefits

## Cross-References
- Link to related prompt files in `.github/prompts/`
- Reference templates in `.github/templates/`
- Connect to workflow documentation in `.copilot/context/workflows/`
